Package index

All functions

countcheck()
Return data frame combining data and results
factor_exceeding()
Calculate by how many standard deviations y_new exceeds upper control limit (UCL)
html_report()
Generate HTML report
select_for_report()
Select data for report
simdat
Simulated data without anomalies
theta_complpool()
Complete-pooling model
theta_nopool()
No-pooling model
theta_partpool()
Partial-pooling model (Bayesian hierarchical model)
ucl()
Calculate upper control limit (UCL)
